about_the_game:
The Legendary DLC is part of the Legendary Bundle which give players access to:

  • 29 Heroes
  • Supporter Discord Role
  • Supporter Profile Icon
  • Epic Bundle Profile Icon
  • Legendary Bundle Profile Icon
  • 10,000 Platinum (Premium currency)
  • Exclusive Construction Steel Skin (Common)
  • Exclusive Inquisitor Gideon Skin (Common)
  • Exclusive Eclipse Muriel Skin (Common)
  • Exclusive Grux Pelt Khaimera Skin (Uncommon)
  • Exclusive Galactic Raider Grux Skin (Uncommon)
  • Exclusive Wasteland Murdock Skin (Epic)
  • Exclusive Blacksite Crunch Skin (Epic)

Some Content may not be available immediately and will be added during Early Access. Bundle Platinum does not stack. Upgrading to Epic gives 4,000 Platinum total. Upgrading to Legendary gives 10,000 Platinum total.
detailed_description:
The Legendary DLC is part of the Legendary Bundle which give players access to:

  • 29 Heroes
  • Supporter Discord Role
  • Supporter Profile Icon
  • Epic Bundle Profile Icon
  • Legendary Bundle Profile Icon
  • 10,000 Platinum (Premium currency)
  • Exclusive Construction Steel Skin (Common)
  • Exclusive Inquisitor Gideon Skin (Common)
  • Exclusive Eclipse Muriel Skin (Common)
  • Exclusive Grux Pelt Khaimera Skin (Uncommon)
  • Exclusive Galactic Raider Grux Skin (Uncommon)
  • Exclusive Wasteland Murdock Skin (Epic)
  • Exclusive Blacksite Crunch Skin (Epic)

Some Content may not be available immediately and will be added during Early Access. Bundle Platinum does not stack. Upgrading to Epic gives 4,000 Platinum total. Upgrading to Legendary gives 10,000 Platinum total.

name: Predecessor: Legendary DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590 or similar
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 2GB or AMD Radeon RX 550 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Needs 8GB RAM available for the game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-11600 or similar
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 Ti 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Needs 8GB RAM available for the game

short_description: Begin your Predecessor journey with the Legendary Bundle.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
